attributes.action: Give every EMA to all students
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is unfair that some Students get EMA and others do not. Just because parents earn over a 30,000 amount doesnt mean the student benifits as the parent probably doesnt give their child any money.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
